00019 #include "CalvinCHPFileWriter.h"
00020 #include "CHPData.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 CHPFileWriter::CHPFileWriter(CHPData &p) 
00025 {
00026         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00027         entryPos = 0;
00028         bgZonePos = 0;
00029         forcePos = 0;
00030         origPos = 0;
00031         maxProbeSetName = p.GetMaxProbeSetName();
00032         WriteHeaders();
00033 }
00034 
00035 CHPFileWriter::~CHPFileWriter() 
00036 {
00037         delete writer;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CHPFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00041 {
00042         writer->WriteHeader();
00043         DataGroupWriterIt beginGrp;
00044         DataGroupWriterIt endGrp;
00045         writer->GetDataGroupWriters(beginGrp, endGrp);
00046         while(beginGrp != endGrp)
00047         {
00048                 DataGroupWriter* dataGroupWriter = &(*beginGrp);
00049                 dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00050 
00051                 DataSetWriterIt beginSet;
00052                 DataSetWriterIt endSet;
00053                 dataGroupWriter->GetDataSetWriters(beginSet, endSet);
00054                 while(beginSet != endSet)
00055                 {
00056                         dataSetWriter = &(*beginSet);
00057                         beginSet->WriteHeader();
00058                         SetFilePositions();
00059                         beginSet++;
00060                 }
00061                 dataGroupWriter->UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00062                 beginGrp++;
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CHPFileWriter::SeekToDataSet()
00067 {
00068         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CHPFileWriter::WriteExpressionEntry(const CHPExpressionEntry& p)
00072 {
00073         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetProbeSetName(), maxProbeSetName);
00074         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetDetection());
00075         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetDetectionPValue());
00076         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetSignal());
00077         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetNumPairs());
00078         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetNumPairsUsed());
00079         if (p.GetHasComparisonData())
00080         {
00081                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetChange());
00082                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetChangePValue());
00083                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetSigLogRatio());
00084                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetSigLogRatioLo());
00085                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetSigLogRatioHi());
00086                 dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetCommonPairs());
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CHPFileWriter::WriteGenotypeEntry(const CHPGenotypeEntry& p)
00091 {
00092         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetProbeSetName(), maxProbeSetName);
00093         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetCall());
00094         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetConfidence());
00095         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetRAS1());
00096         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetRAS2());
00097         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetAACall());
00098         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetABCall());
00099         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetBBCall());
00100         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetNoCall());
00101 }
00102 
00103 void CHPFileWriter::WriteUniversalEntry(const CHPUniversalEntry& p)
00104 {
00105         dataSetWriter->Write(p.GetBackground());
00106 }
00107 
00108 void CHPFileWriter::WriteReseqEntry(const CHPReseqEntry& p)
00109 {
00110         dataSetWriter->Write((int8_t)p.call);
00111         dataSetWriter->Write(p.score);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void CHPFileWriter::SeekToBgSet()
00115 {
00116         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(bgZonePos);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void CHPFileWriter::WriteBackgroundZone(const CHPBackgroundZone& zone)
00120 {
00121         dataSetWriter->Write(zone.GetCenterX());
00122         dataSetWriter->Write(zone.GetCenterY());
00123         dataSetWriter->Write(zone.GetBackground());
00124         dataSetWriter->Write(zone.GetSmoothFactor());
00125 }
00126 
00127 void CHPFileWriter::SeekToForceSet()
00128 {
00129         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(forcePos);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void CHPFileWriter::WriteForceCall(const CHPReseqForceCall& force)
00133 {
00134         dataSetWriter->Write(force.position);
00135         dataSetWriter->Write((int8_t)force.call);
00136         dataSetWriter->Write((int8_t)force.reason);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void CHPFileWriter::SeekToOrigCallSet()
00140 {
00141         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(origPos);
00142 }
00143 
00144 void CHPFileWriter::WriteOrigCall(const CHPReseqOrigCall& orig)
00145 {
00146         dataSetWriter->Write(orig.position);
00147         dataSetWriter->Write((int8_t)orig.call);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void CHPFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00151 {
00152         const std::wstring &name = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetName();
00153         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00154         if(name == CHP_BG_ZONE_GROUP)
00155         {
00156                 bgZonePos = writer->GetFilePos();
00157         }
00158         else if (name == CHP_RESEQ_FORCE_CALL_GROUP)
00159         {
00160                 forcePos = writer->GetFilePos();
00161         }
00162         else if (name == CHP_RESEQ_ORIG_CALL_GROUP)
00163         {
00164                 origPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00165         }
00166         else
00167         {
00168                 entryPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00169         }
00170 
00171         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00172         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00173 }
